title: Anthony Davis, Lakers, Jared Goff, and Kyrie Irving
itunes:title: Anthony Davis, Lakers, Jared Goff, and Kyrie Irving
description:
Colin discusses why New Orleans Pelicans F Anthony Davis isn't as great as some people think, why teams shouldn't be upset with the Los Angeles Lakers, why Los Angeles Rams QB Jared Goff is better than New England Patriots QB Tom Brady at this point in his career, and why Boston Celtics G Kyrie Irving is a flake. Guests include Albert Breer, Jeff Garcia, and Chris Haynes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
